myFileDescrip: Keep your personal files secure on **My File NYC.** Upload pictures of your files, download files whenever you need, and share files with NYC agencies when applying for benefits.
loginText: Log into or create a **NYC account (NYC.ID)** to get started. You can also use your **ACCESS HRA** account to sign in.
noFamilyMembers: There is no family members added here.
createProfileBodyText: This will be the person responsible for managing and submitting documents.

validations.DOBMin: Provide date of birth before todays date

toastLoggedOut: You logged out of My File
nyc: Official website of the City of New York
copyrightText: Â© 2024 City of New York. All Rights Reserved. NYC is a trademark and service mark of the City of New York.
familyMemberDOB: What is their date of birth?
familyMemberDisclamerParagraphOne: Add family members who are currently living with you or are part of the household.
familyMemberDisclamerParagraphTwo: Adding family members helps you organize their documents, making it easier for your application to be processed quickly.
familyMembreRemoveBegining: Are you sure you want to remove
familyMemberRemoveWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this family member?
familyMemberRemoveApplication: Do you still want to delete?
addFamilyMemberInfo: Add your family member's information such as their first name, last name, date of birth, and relationship.
updateFAmilyMemberwillUpdateDocuments: Changes will update all documents linked to this family member. Review carefully before changing.
activityLogDescription: Stay updated on all the activities on your account here. See what changes were made, when they happened, and who made them.
activityLogEmptyState: When you make any changes on your account you will be able to see your activity history.
activityLogTryDifferentSearch: Try adjusting or cleaning your filters to display better results
